full_summary:
# 5P435-220134 - Impact Attenuators

## Request for Proposal
### Invitation to Tender

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Parks Canada Agency (PC) invites eligible suppliers to submit a proposal for the supply and delivery of five (5) tow behind impact attenuators.

## Tender Details

| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Title | 5P435-220134 - Impact Attenuators |
| Solicitation Number | WS3648117054 |
| Tender Closing Date and Time | 2022-11-03T14:00:00 EDT |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2022-12-08 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2023-03-31 |

## Services Required

Parks Canada Agency’s Highway Operations Unit requires the supply and delivery of five (5) impact attenuators for use on highways and roadways within the mountain parks.

## Classification Information
- **UNSPSC Code**: 25101907
- **UNSPSC Description**: Trailer, travel or caravan

## Procurement Details

- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
- **Contract Type**: Request for Proposal

## Award Criteria
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and others.

## Contracting Entity

- **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

## Contact Information
- **Contact Name**: Tanya Gostev
- **Contact Email**: [tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Bid Documents
Visit [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14274888?extsite=MTQyNzQ4ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14274888?extsite=MTQyNzQ4ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
